primaryGoal: Support the functions of the gnosta.ai website and overall company operations through the development and implementation of the Model Context Protocol (MCP) and related tools.

mcpDetails.purpose: Standardize interaction between AI models/agents and external tools, data, and services.
mcpDetails.contentSummary: Includes specifications, schemas (JSON, TypeScript), documentation (MDX), and SDKs (TypeScript/Node.js, Java).

components.name: MCP Protocol Definition & Documentation
components.description: Core specifications, schemas, documentation, and SDKs for MCP.

components.name: MCP Server Implementations
components.description: Contains implementations of MCP servers, such as the gdrive_mcp_server (TypeScript, Docker).

components.name: Management & Configuration Scripts
components.description: Shell/batch scripts for running servers and JSON configuration files located in the project root.

components.name: Image Assets
components.description: Directory containing image assets for the project.

components.name: Miscellaneous Assets
components.description: Directory containing miscellaneous supporting files (e.g., HTML examples).
